original_title: L'Incoronazione del Sommo Pontefice Pio XII
overview: Reconstruction of the life of Eugenio Pacelli from the very first stages to the pontifical election of March 2, 1939. "From the famous smoke on the Vatican Palace, to the assumption of Cardinal Eugenio Pacelli to the supreme ecclesiastical dignity. Historical documentary of great interest".
title: L'Incoronazione del Sommo Pontefice Pio XII
